steps.text: Hey look! The 3rd button on this quantum piano lit up. Try pressing it.
Cool, you heard the note you pressed, just like a normal piano. Try again, this time with the second button.
Woah, this is different. Now 2 of the buttons are lit up just a bit. What happens if you press the 4th button: F?
That's strange. You heard a G this time... Well, it looks the same as before. What if you press F again?
